synopsis.text: Rupia, the young prince of Jambe island, seethes with jealousy when an introverted local boy, Subarna, is bestowed with a magical crown. With the crown's power, Subarna transforms into a beloved hero, admired for his compassionate nature. In a fit of rage, Rupia orders Subarna's arrest, sparking a conflict that threatens the peace of the island.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
